name: THE BAD COMMA (DEMO)
description:
Welcome to THE BAD COMMA (DEMO)!

-----

Thanks for playing the demo version.

In the game, you are spawned in a maze and you have to find the way to escape! Sounds fun right?

This is the Demo version of the game, so feel free to wait for the full release!

The game may contain some shortages, bugs or glitches. But don't worry, I will complete the full release as soon as possible!

-----

Version: Demo1.2 (Demo Project)

Genre: Puzzle

Engine: Unity3d

Creator: DESURRATE
